overview: Not having had time to enjoy the first night with Mala, Irfan arrives at his father-in-law, Bambang, the most annoying person in the world. Bambang wants to stay at his house. Worse, Mala was assigned to Surabaya, so Irfan had to live alone with Bambang, who no one in the world could afford to live with.
title: Ada Mertua Di Rumahku
